mapper.select:
select ci.id, ci.expert_code, ci.enterprise_code, ci.`type`, ci.content, ci.create_date, ei.name as expertName, ei.images as expertImages, ei2.name as enterpriseName, ei2.images as enterpriseImages from chat_info ci left join expert_info ei on (ei.code = ci.expert_code) left join enterprise_info ei2 on (ei2.code = ci.enterprise_code) where 1 = 1
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chatInfo.expertName},'%')
AND ei2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chatInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
order by ci.create_date desc
